arts.ttl: Colchester United boss Danny Cowley on 2-1 win over Walsall
arts.sum: Goals from Owura Edwards and Teddy Bishop sealed a fine win for the U's, after Charlie Lakin had given the Saddlers the lead, just after the hour mark. U's boss Cowley said: "I'm really pleased for the players, the staff and for Robbie (Cowling) but the supporters...they haven't had enough good days and since I've been here, we haven't been ready to beat enough top teams.

arts.ttl: Former Colchester Villa Youth player praised by Pep Guardiola after wonder goal
arts.sum: Spurs loanee Donley, who scored a remarkable 175 goals for Villa’s under-eights, gave Orient a surprise lead after 16 minutes of the fourth-round clash with a sensational 40-yard lob that hit the crossbar and bounced in off City goalkeeper Stefan Ortega. Orient boss Richie Wellens admitted it was a shame to see it go down as an Ortega own-goal after Donley's long-range strike hit the crossbar and bounced in off City's back-up goalkeeper.

arts.ttl: Colchester United beat League Two leaders Walsall 2-1
arts.sum: Colchester were the better side in the first half but they needed a magnificent challenge by Fiacre Kelleher in the 19th minute to deny Walsall skipper Jamille Matt a free shot on goal in the area, seconds after Tom Flanagan had appeared to have been fouled. Two goals in the space of five minutes from Owura Edwards and Teddy Bishop sealed the U's comeback win at the JobServe Community Stadium, after Charlie Lakin had given the Saddlers a second-half lead.

arts.ttl: Walsall’s wobble continues as they lose at Colchester
arts.sum: Goals from Teddy Bishop and Owura Edwards earned the home side victory.

Colchester's 3-1 win over Tranmere last weekend was their third win in their last four games. Walsall came from two goals down to draw with Salford last weekend, the league leaders have now won just ...

arts.ttl: Preview: Colchester United vs. Walsall - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League Two clash between Colchester United and Walsall, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
